titleStmt.title: The maides revenge A tragedy. As it hath beene acted with good applause at the private house in Drury Lane, by her Majesties Servants· VVritten by Iames Shirley Gent.
titleStmt.author: Shirley, James, 1596-1666.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T[homas] C[otes] for William Cooke, and are to be sold at his shop in Furnivalls Inne Gate in Holbourne,

notesStmt.note: Printer's name from STC. A variant (STC 22450a), probably earlier, lacks Cotes' initials in imprint.
Probably printed in early 1640; see "Studies in Bibliography" 1 (1948-9, p. 151-82).
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
